bibl.title: The Nile Mosaic of Palestrina. Early Evidence of Egyptian Religion in Italy. (Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 121.)
bibl.note: Introduction. - I. The reconstruction of the original mosaic. - II. The original location and the date of the mosaic [between 120 and 110 B.C.]. - III. Description. - IV. Interpretation. - V. The function of the Nile mosaic. - VI. The workshop. - VII. The cultural background. - Appendices [en part. pp. 177-180: 19. Illustrated papyrus scrolls]. - Notes. - Bibliography. - Index.
